FuncDef: The reset ipv6-pool max-usage command clears the historical maximum usage of addresses in an IPv6 address pool.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an address pool.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Specifies a domain name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting statistics on the historical maximum usage of addresses in an IPv6 address pool, run the reset ipv6-pool max-usage command to clear the existing statistics. Then the statistics displayed in the display ipv6-pool max-usage command output will be accurate.
Statistics on the historical maximum usage of addresses in an IPv6 address pool cannot be restored after they are cleared. Exercise caution when running the reset ipv6-pool max-usage command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
